<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#define LLVM&#95;ADT&#95;DAGDELTAALGORITHM&#95;H</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#include &lt;utility&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#include &lt;vector&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="comment">/// DAGDeltaAlgorithm - Implements a &quot;delta debugging&quot; algorithm for minimizing</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="comment">/// directed acyclic graphs using a predicate function.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The result of the algorithm is a subset of the input change set which is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="comment">/// guaranteed to satisfy the predicate, assuming that the input set did. For</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="comment">/// well formed predicates, the result set is guaranteed to be such that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="comment">/// removing any single element not required by the dependencies on the other</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">/// elements would falsify the predicate.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The DAG should be used to represent dependencies in the changes which are</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">/// likely to hold across the predicate function. That is, for a particular</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">/// changeset S and predicate P:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">///   P(S) =&gt; P(S union pred(S))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The minimization algorithm uses this dependency information to attempt to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="comment">/// eagerly prune large subsets of changes. As with \\see DeltaAlgorithm, the DAG</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="comment">/// is not required to satisfy this property, but the algorithm will run</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="comment">/// substantially fewer tests with appropriate dependencies. \\see DeltaAlgorithm</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">/// for more information on the properties which the predicate function itself</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="comment">/// should satisfy.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagdeltaalgorithm"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagdeltaalgorithm">DAGDeltaAlgorithm</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">virtual</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> anchor();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagdeltaalgorithm/#ad4db5080e3127c468dd4bc6c0812142c"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagdeltaalgorithm/#ad4db5080e3127c468dd4bc6c0812142c">change&#95;ty</a> = unsigned;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagdeltaalgorithm/#a658d0ed343fe1a2a704d4219a0a1a8ec"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagdeltaalgorithm/#a658d0ed343fe1a2a704d4219a0a1a8ec">edge&#95;ty</a> = std::pair&lt;change&#95;ty, change&#95;ty&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: Use a decent data structure.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagdeltaalgorithm/#a3f8cd32d8d69f713bf3c1dbeb942273a"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagdeltaalgorithm/#a3f8cd32d8d69f713bf3c1dbeb942273a">changeset&#95;ty</a> = std::set&lt;change&#95;ty&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagdeltaalgorithm/#a2ef67c22dd53f113a1efa84a39ce14da"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagdeltaalgorithm/#a2ef67c22dd53f113a1efa84a39ce14da">changesetlist&#95;ty</a> = std::vector&lt;changeset&#95;ty&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagdeltaalgorithm/#acb9bf7f6f4b974912a37ab46382cafe4"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">virtual</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagdeltaalgorithm/#acb9bf7f6f4b974912a37ab46382cafe4">~DAGDeltaAlgorithm</a>() = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">default</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Run - Minimize the DAG formed by the \\p Changes vertices and the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\p Dependencies edges by executing \\see ExecuteOneTest() on subsets of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// changes and returning the smallest set which still satisfies the test</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// predicate and the input \\p Dependencies.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param Changes The list of changes.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param Dependencies The list of dependencies amongst changes. For each</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// (x,y) in \\p Dependencies, both x and y must be in \\p Changes. The</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// minimization algorithm guarantees that for each tested changed set S,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\f$ x \\in S \\f$ implies \\f$ y \\in S \\f$. It is an error to have cyclic</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// dependencies.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagdeltaalgorithm/#a3f8cd32d8d69f713bf3c1dbeb942273a">changeset&#95;ty</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagdeltaalgorithm/#ad81448e27f4064d1df0bc1b6d816e65a">Run</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagdeltaalgorithm/#a3f8cd32d8d69f713bf3c1dbeb942273a">changeset&#95;ty</a> &amp;Changes,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="normal">                   </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::vector&lt;edge&#95;ty&gt; &amp;Dependencies);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// UpdatedSearchState - Callback used when the search state changes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagdeltaalgorithm/#a99839595939902668e36df8ee1719c0e"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">virtual</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagdeltaalgorithm/#a99839595939902668e36df8ee1719c0e">UpdatedSearchState</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagdeltaalgorithm/#a3f8cd32d8d69f713bf3c1dbeb942273a">changeset&#95;ty</a> &amp;Changes,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagdeltaalgorithm/#a2ef67c22dd53f113a1efa84a39ce14da">changesetlist&#95;ty</a> &amp;Sets,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagdeltaalgorithm/#a3f8cd32d8d69f713bf3c1dbeb942273a">changeset&#95;ty</a> &amp;Required) &#123;&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// ExecuteOneTest - Execute a single test predicate on the change set \\p S.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagdeltaalgorithm/#a2ce094907b560cfd137fc68897103e48"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">virtual</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagdeltaalgorithm/#a2ce094907b560cfd137fc68897103e48">ExecuteOneTest</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dagdeltaalgorithm/#a3f8cd32d8d69f713bf3c1dbeb942273a">changeset&#95;ty</a> &amp;S) = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
